altTitles.ja: BLUE GIANT 特別編
ブルージャイアント
ブルージャイント

description.en:
A high school 3rd year student, Miyamoto Dai, whose heart was touched by Jazz, continued to play the Saxophone alone in Kawahara, rain or shine, day or night, for many years. "I want to become the world's best Saxophone player…!!" Effort, talent, faith, environment, luck…which are necessary? A tale of reaching towards his goal recklessly and sincerely begins in Hirosegawa, Sendai.  

[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/) 

---
- English release by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/blue-giant/)  
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (2018)

---
- **Won the 62nd Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga**
- **Won the 20th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
description.vi:
Miyamoto Dai, một học sinh trung học, mang trong mình một niềm đam mê mãnh liệt với nhạc Jazz. Cậu chơi Saxophone một mình tại Kawahara trong nhiều năm bất kể mưa hay nắng, ngày hay đêm.
“Tôi muốn trở thành một nghệ sĩ Saxophone giỏi nhất thế giới … !!”
Với sự nỗ lực, tài năng, niềm tin và may mắn, liệu cậu có thành công? Một câu chuyện hay về sự nỗ lực, liều lĩnh và sự chân thành để đạt tới mục tiêu mà mình đặt ra bắt đầu ở Hirosegawa, Sendai.
Manga được đề cử cho giải thưởng Manga Taisho lần thứ 8 và thứ 9. Giành được Giải thưởng Manga Shogakukan lần thứ 62 cho hạng mục Seinen và đoạt giải thưởng lớn tại Liên hoan nghệ thuật truyền thông Nhật Bản lần thứ 20 ở hạng mục Manga.
description.pt-br: Aluno do 3º ano, Miyamoto Dai, o qual teve seu coração tocado pelo Jazz, continua a tocar seu saxofone sozinho em Kawahara, seja chuva ou seja sol, dia ou noite, por vários anos. Com o desejo de ser o melhor músico de sax do mundo, do que ele mais precisa? Trabalho duro, esforço, fé, sorte? Esta é uma história sobre um jovem, em busca de seus objetivos.

少女杀手阿墨
百人斩少女

description.en:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.

altTitles.ja: 寵愛を拒むのになんで執着するんですか

altTitles.en: Why Do You Love Me When I Refuse Your Request?
Why Are You Obsessed With Me Even Though I Reject Your Affection?
Why Are You Obsessed When I Reject Your Favor?

altTitles.pt-br: Por Que Estão Obcecados por Mim se Rejeito o Seu Amor?

description.en:
Shuelina has only ever wanted to be loved as she grew up in an orphanage.
But after her birth father rejected her in a previous life, she tries to find a family who will accept her in this one.
Luckily, Archduke Bylot and his sons fall for her indomitable spirit, and they shower her with the love she has longed for.
But once they find out she's the long-lost imperial princess, can she be a part of their family?
Or will she have to go back to the people who sent her away in the first place?

(Source: Tapas)

___
Alternative Raw: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4185)
Official JP translation: [Piccoma](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173647)
description.ko:
사랑받으려면 이럴 때 어떻게 해야 하는 걸까?
“넌 내 아이가 아니야. 슈엘리나는 정령 거울형에 처한다.”

진짜 황녀 슈엘리나는 황비의 계략으로 고아원에 버려져 평생을 외로이 살아간다.
마침내 친부인 황제를 만났지만 끝내 비참한 최후를 맞이하게 되고...

‘슈엘리나. 난 너처럼 살지 않겠어.’

이 상황에서 벗어나기 위해 바일롯 대공가의 후원을 받으며 사랑스러움을 뽐냈더니-

“슈엘리나는 제 딸입니다.”
“저 애는 황녀다. 황실의 피야.”
황제가 날 찾으러 왔다.

“슈엘리나가 돌아오면 검술도 가르쳐주고 업어주기도 할 거야.”
친오빠도 날 찾으러 왔다.

나는 대공가에 있을 거야. 너희들은 슈엘리나의 말은 들어주지도 않았잖아.
이런 총애는 필요 없어!

altTitles.ja: J⇔M　ジェイエム

description.en:
J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld.
Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school.
When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
description.uk: Джей - самотній найманий вбивця, якого у злочинному світі вважають "невразливим". Меґумі - самотня дівчинка, якій немає місця ні вдома, ні в школі. Коли вони познайомилися, розпочалася несподівана історія, Джей та Меґумі обмінялися тілами. Тепер, Джей змушений взятися за завдання по вбивству у своєму новому тілі.

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba Monogatari: Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: 紛争でしたら八田まで

altTitles.en: In Case of a Dispute, Contact Hatta

description.en: When ethnicities, languages and thoughts mingle together, there's no way of avoiding conflicts. Now of course, if you change your place of residence, the nature of conflicts that occur will also change! Therefore, Hatta Yuri a geopolitical risk consultant tries to solve the ethnic problems in Southeast Asia, the terrible incidents that occur in Africa, and the corporate problems that occur in Europe!?
description.ja: イギリスに本社がある企業に地政学リスクコンサルタントとして勤める八田百合。彼女の仕事は、地政学に基づいた知性と、ちょっとの荒技で世界中の事件を解決すること。そんな彼女に依頼を出してきたのは、ミャンマーにある日本の企業だった…。

title.en: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.uk: Годі з мене чоловіка - йду заробляти гроші

altTitles.zh: 要什么老公，我只想搞钱

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.es-la: Terminé con mi esposo, ahora iré a hacer dinero

description.en:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldn’t bother them, right?

“Then, you sleep on the floor.”
“What?”

It seems that he doesn’t like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I don’t have any other choice.

“We’ll just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?”

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night…?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarch’s Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian…

“I have to present my wife with the most precious things.”

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

“I’ll just go and make money.”

It’s long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, I’ll Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?

altTitles.ja: 不運からの最強男

description.en:
After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.
description.id:
Siegbert yang selalu tertimpa kemalangan di kehidupan sebelumnya, sekarang ia tereinkarnasi ke dunia lain.
Ia tidak mengira keluarga barunya merupakan keluarga yang hangat karena kemalangan yang ia hadapi di kehidupan sebelumnya.
Akan tetapi, apakah ia akan tetap dihujani oleh kemalangan bahkan setelah tereinkarnasi?

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: Moushin Listener: Yamiochi Haishinsha ni Koishite

altTitles.ja: 妄信リスナー 闇堕ち配信者に恋して

altTitles.en: Credulous Listener: Loving a Streamer Who Has Fallen to the Dark Side
Moushin Listener: Falling in Love with a Dark Streamer

description.en: A friend stabbed a popular streamer to death. University student Asagiri Hina returns to six months ago to save her friend who went crazy and fell in love with the handsome streamer Ravi. However, Ravi was a scumbag who exploited his fans' affection and sold them to the sex industry. To prevent the tragedy from repeating, Hina decides to break her friend's brainwashing. Can she avoid the tragic end!? A story of desires born from the internet society
description.ja: 親友が人気配信者を刺殺した──。大学生の朝霧陽菜は、イケメン配信者ラビにガチ恋して狂ってしまった親友を救うため、半年前に回帰する。ところがラビはファンの愛情を搾取した末に風俗に売り飛ばすようなクズ男だった。悲劇を繰り返さないため、親友の洗脳を解くと決めた陽菜。果たして悲惨な結末を回避できるのか！？ネット社会が生み出した欲望のストーリー【クレジット】原作：西然実音ネーム・背景：もりもとキャラ線画：sno着彩：FELICO STUDIO CO., LTD.制作：Minto Studio

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen

altTitles.es-la: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Conferencia de los Clanes Maestros

altTitles.es: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Cumbre de los Clanes Maestros

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Master Clans Conference Arc
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Master Clans Summit

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Собрание главных кланов

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 師族会議編

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō-sei - Shi-zoku Kaigi-hen

description.en:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
description.es:
La sucesión al los Yotsuba y el compromiso de Shiba Miyuki se anunció a la comunidad mágica. Sin embargo, la Familia Ichijou de los Diez Clanes Maestros presentó una objeción. Mientras tanto, la atmósfera en la Preparatoria de Magia, el aire de respeto por los hermanos Shiba, que habían ocultado sus identidades, está siendo evitado, y Tatsuya y Miyuki se están aislando. ¡Un nuevo episodio que describe la nueva relación entre los dos ha sido adaptado a un cómic por el nuevo Takeda Hazumi!  
  
Adaptación de los volúmenes 17-19 de la novela ligera original.

title.en: The Villainous Duke's Daughter's Special Method of Growing Rice

altTitles.ko: 악역 공작 영애의 특별한 쌀 재배법

description.en: When you transmigrate into a novel as the villainess destined to die, there are different ways to survive: flirting with the male lead, learning to fight, or finding happiness elsewhere—but not Erica! She has decided to become a successful rice farmer just like in her past life! What follows is an epic (and rather surreal) quest to find the last rice seeds in the world, tame a giant rabbit magic beast, recruit magicians to water the fields, and—Wait, did she just turn the Holy Sword into a hoe?!

title.en: Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の兄に転生しました

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--
description.id:
"Abwang?"

Cain, orang yang baru saja bereinkarnasi menjadi salah satu target kencan di sebuah otome game, tiba-tiba berteriak karena melihat keimutan adik perempuannya, Diana.
Aku tidak menyangka kalau malaikat kecil ini akan menjadi seorang villainess dengan akhir yang tragis-- Tidak, aku tidak akan membiarkan masa depan seperti itu terjadi!
Dengan mengepalkan tangannya, dia bertekat untuk membesarkan adik perempuannya menjadi seorang wanita yang baik hati dan tidak sombong, sembari menghilangkan segala masa lalu yang buruk dari para target kencan lain menggantikan sang tokoh utama.
Bergantung pada pengetahuannya tentang gamenya di kehidupan yang dulu dan juga pengalamannya sebagai anak yatim piastu, semuanya dilakukan demi adik perempuannya-- dan akhirnya, tantangan bagi sang kakak akan dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: ゲーム実況中に過労死し、乙女ゲームのキャラ・カインに転生した俺は、妹・ディア―ナの圧倒的可愛さに心を奪われた。しかし、このままゲーム世界が進んでいけば、妹は辺境の地で凌辱されたり、暗殺者に殺される壮絶なバットエンドを迎えると決まっていた。「この世界で妹を幸せにする!!」そう誓った俺は妹を淑女に育てながら、ゲームのシナリオに逆らっていく。そう、すべては愛する妹のため……。「おにーたま、ディ、にんじんもたべたのです!」「えらい! ディアーナは何て素晴らしいんだ!!!」

altTitles.zh: 看见血条的我，处刑神明！

altTitles.zh-ro: Kànjiàn xiě tiáo de wǒ, chǔxíng shénmíng
Kan Jian Xie Tiao De Wo, Chuxing Shenming!

description.en: The abyss descends, and the invasion of the alien races begins... The young boy stands amidst the dense white mist, with no light ahead or behind him. In this situation, how will he make his choices? In the era of the Long Night, do the gods truly live forever? The young boy sees through the lifeblood of all things and executes the gods!
description.pt-br: O abismo desce e a invasão das raças alienígenas começa… O menino está parado em meio à densa névoa branca, sem luz à frente ou atrás dele. Nessa situação, como ele fará suas escolhas? Na era da Longa Noite, os deuses realmente vivem para sempre? O menino vê através da força vital de todas as coisas e executa os deuses!

description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.
Think you know how it ends? Think again. Jump into this psychological thriller anthology packed with unexpected twists.

altTitles.ja: 魔鬼

description.en:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."

In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions.

---
The lady trapped in the tower is being forced into a marriage. Her husband has killed or exiled his previous wives several times. The frightened princess eventually wakes up the sarcophagus in the basement and calls out the devil....

"I don't want to marry him, Raven."

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**

description.ja:
塔に閉じ込められた公女に縁談の話が持ち上がる。彼女の旦那になる男は前妻を何人も殺したと言われる残虐な老人。恐ろしくなった公女は地下室の石棺を壊し悪魔を呼び出すのだが…「悪魔よ、わたくしはあの方と結婚したくありません」

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1165)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32223)
* Japanese / 日本語: [Comico](https://www.comico.jp/comic/8141), [Mecha Comics](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/141901)
description.zh:
贡女伊奈特与双胞胎弟弟约翰被母亲分离，从此伊奈特被关在了房里。直到成人，她也没有能再见到约翰。在她结婚的第一天晚上，丈夫不知缘由地被杀害。直到某天，她再次有了婚约，而即将成为她丈夫的男人，传闻是个残忍的老头，并杀死了他好几个前妻。因此害怕的她来到了地下室，打破了石棺，召来了魔鬼，希望能够阻止这场婚约。而就在她许下愿望的那天晚上，约翰的房间里却传出了奇怪的尖叫声……

---

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

altTitles.pt-br: O dilema de um arquidemônio: como amar sua noiva elfa

altTitles.es: Soy un rey demonio y he tomado como esposa a una elfa esclava, ¿cómo puedo amarla?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un rey demonio y he tomado como esposa a una elfa esclava, ¿cómo puedo amarla?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.
description.es-la: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: Mata Korosarete Shimatta no desu ne, Tantei-sama

altTitles.ja: また殺されてしまったのですね、探偵様

description.en: High school student Sakuya Otsuki, whose father is a legendary detective, works as a half-baked detective alongside his beautiful and talented assistant Lilithea. However, due to Sakuya's "special constitution" and a request that comes in one day, they become embroiled in a major incident, and their fates change dramatically.
description.ja: 伝説の名探偵を父に持つ高校生・追月朔也は、助手の少女・リリテアと2人で探偵業に勤しんでいた。しかし、朔也に宿る“特殊体質”、そして一つの依頼が、彼らをやがて大きな事件に巻き込んでいく――。

description.en: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
description.pt-br: Park Yun-yeong tem um poder misterioso que permite que ela veja criaturas horríveis que parecem habitar nosso mundo, mas sem interagir com ele, a menos que percebam que você sabe que eles existem. É nesse momento que eles deixam de ser inofensivos.

title.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.ja-ro: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru

altTitles.vi: Nàng Sói Trót Phải Lòng Với Mặt Trăng

description.en: The serialized version of [this one-shot](https://mangadex.org/title/d3caccaa-7ede-415d-ada4-b949ac8b66f5) by Komaki Maria!
description.vi: Phần tiếp theo của [one-shot này](https://mangadex.org/title/d3caccaa-7ede-415d-ada4-b949ac8b66f5) từ tác giả Komaki Maria!

altTitles.ja: トライガンマキシマム

description.en:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

description.en: After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.
description.uk: Будучи маріонеткою своєї прийомної матері, Саї ніколи не була вільною. Вона була безсила дати відсіч і перебувала у владі інших. Після переродження вона вирішує все це змінити.

title.en: The Story of the Kiwi Bird

description.en: A story based on New Zealand's kiwi mythology
description.uk: Історія, заснована на новозеландській міфології птаха ківі.
description.zh: 根据新西兰的几维鸟神话改编的故事

description.en:
Year 2036, Japan is under the adult party power and make children's life miserable. But for "rebelious-edgy-teenager-with-funny-scar" Kudo Eiji, It doesn't matter because he has his childhood friend Akari to cheer his everyday life. For Eiji, Akari is his emontional mainstay. Someone that can make him calm.  
  
But then, one day adult party decide took Akari and transfer her to another school. It emotionaly stress Eiji out. Little did Eiji know, this awaken some power inside him.
description.ru:
2036 год. Япония находится под властью Партии Взрослых, которая делает невыносимой жизнь детей и подростков. Но для "мятежного-раздражительного-подростка-с-забавным-шрамом" Кудо Эйдзи это всё не имеет значения, так как у него есть друг детства Акари, которая скрашивает его повседневную жизнь. Для Эйдзи, Акари является своего рода опорой, той, кто успокаивает его.  
Но в один прекрасный день Партия Взрослых приняла решение перевести Акари в другую школу. Это выбивает Эйдзи из колеи, из-за чего в нём что-то пробуждается…

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

altTitles.de: Die Tagebücher der Apothekerin - Geheimnisse am Kaiserhof

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.

description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.pt-br:
Em uma certa corte imperial, já faz alguns meses desde que uma garota de 17 anos conhecida como Maomao foi sequestrada e forçada a trabalhar como uma serva de baixo escalão no palácio do imperador. Ainda assim, ela consegue manter seu espírito curioso e pragmático, planejando trabalhar até que seus anos de servidão acabem. Um dia, no entanto, ela descobre que os dois bebês do imperador ficaram gravemente doentes. Ela decide agir secretamente, aproveitando sua experiência como farmacêutica criada no pobre distrito da luz vermelha.

Apesar das tentativas de Maomao de permanecer anônima, ela logo chama a atenção de Jinshi, um eunuco influente que reconhece seus talentos. Maomao logo se encontra na corte interna do imperador, onde gradualmente faz seu nome ao utilizar seu conhecimento e personalidade excêntrica para resolver vários mistérios médicos.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 5, Cap 40. ]
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

altTitles.ja: 私のこと、寝取ってみせて

description.en: Kurashiro Shion is a lonely highschool boy with a crush. Kira Hinano is a popular girl at the center of the class, but her kindness even reaches people like Kurashiro. As they bond over similar hobbies, Kurashiro falls in love with Kira and finally confesses his feelings... only to be crushed when Kira admits that she already has a boyfriend. Kurashiro becomes despondent, but then Kira says to him...

altTitles.pt-br: Sem querer seduzi o caçula do reino

altTitles.ru: Я случайно соблазнила младшего брата главного героя

altTitles.ja: 間違って男主人公の弟を口説いちゃった

altTitles.id: Tidak sengaja menggoda adik male lead

altTitles.zh: 不小心勾引了男主的弟弟

altTitles.es: No quise cautivar al hermano menor del protagonista masculino

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Vô Tình Quyến Rũ Em Trai Của Nam Chính

altTitles.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---

description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---

description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---

description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

---

description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)

* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---

description.en:
Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone.

Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!?

What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose…!!? A love comedy about a young lady disguising herself, and a boy in an enviable situation!

(Source: ComicWalker)

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.

---

description.ja:
誰もが羨む美貌と知性を持つ、西園寺グループのお嬢様・紗良…を彼女に持つ冴えない男子高校生・佐伯。

他人にはクール＆ツンしか見せない絶対零度のお嬢様な紗良と仲睦まじい関係を築いているが、実は二人にはある秘密があった!!
そんな秘密を抱えているのもあり、中々踏み出せない佐伯をよそに、紗良は彼のためにお弁当を用意したり、関係を深めるために抱きしめ合ったり、佐伯を堕とそうとするようなアプローチをしかけてくる!!!?

二人の恋人関係の秘密とはいったい、そして紗良の目的とは…!!? お嬢様との羨ましすぎる、複雑Hな偽装ラブコメ!!!!

altTitles.en: 0 Years Old Child Starting Dash Story

altTitles.fr: Les premiers pas de Lilia la prodige

description.en:
This is a tale of Lilia with her new game cheat as she becomes known as the marquess' daughter who is a genius at both magic and territorial management. Having been born with memories of her past life intact and after learning that the world that she has been reborn in has magic, Lilia's past life's gamer spirit can't help but go on full blast!

She started leveling up even from when she was only a 0 year old baby who could only babble! Thanks to that, by the time she was 5 years old, not only could she already use high-grade magic, she also had high ranking spirits serving her. She even exhibited great capability in managing the marquess' territory!

No matter if this world were an RPG or a farming game, this cheat is surely unbeatable! And that was what Lilia was thinking until she had suddenly caught the attention of the royal family and was even invited to the royal capital to celebrate her birthday. Who would have thought she would actually raise a political marriage flag with the princes, just like in an otome game?! Just please let me at least not be a villainous noble lady!!!

---

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven “chosen heroes” meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly “useless” skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he’s never seen before!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された少年ソラは、勇者として魔王と戦うことを命じられる。しかし与えられた「ウォーキング」スキルの効果は、どんなに歩いても疲れないだけ! 国王から見放され、追放されたソラであったが、一度異世界へ足を踏み出すと突然レベルアップ!? 実は「ウォーキング」には「1歩進むごとに経験値１を獲得する」という隠し効果があったのだ!! その経験値で様々なスキルを獲得、歩くごとに万能となっていくソラは、のんびり気ままな異世界の旅へと歩み出す!!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

description.en: Violetta, striving to support her sister after losing their parents, encounters Theobald, an enigmatic aristocrat who irrevocably alters her life. Taking on the role as Theobald's maid, Violetta navigates treacherous waters filled with political intrigue and forbidden desires. As Violetta and Theobald's relationship deepens amidst a backdrop of betrayal and manipulation, Violetta grapples with her conflicting loyalties and the moral ambiguity of her role as both confidante and pawn in a dangerous game.

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: あさこ

description.en: The challenged relationship between Masashi Aoshima, an 11-year-old boy living in a seaside fishing village, and Asako, a mysterious beauty from Tokyo who came to stay at his guest house.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

title.en: Ambivalent: A World Where Losing Your Virginity Means Death

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...
